text: Jijnesa karuna nabhomandala o bhumandalera palanakarta ke? Bale dinah allaha! Balunah tabe ki tomara allaha byatita emana abhibhabaka sthira karecha, yara nijedera bhala-mandera o malika naya? Balunah andha caksusmana ki samana haya? Athaba kotha'o ki andhakara o alo samana haya. Tabe ki tara allahara jan'ya emana ansidara sthira kareche ye, tara kichu srsti kareche, yemana srsti karechena allaha? Atahpara tadera srsti erupa bibhranti ghatiyeche? Balunah allaha'i pratyeka bastura srasta ebam tini ekaka, parakramasali.
